scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The cartes-de-visite portrait album dates from circa 1870 to 1890 and contains 200 items. The portraits in this collection depict well-known American and British individuals of the 19th century and earlier, including various heads of state, musicians, actors, and authors.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids
otherfindaid.p: Item-level description and digital versions of images from the collection are available for searching via the image database in the library.
